sources.title: Dinky Sinky (full-length comedy, drama comedy completely German, full feature films new 2023)

metadata.Plot: After three years engagement, Tobias can no longer stand that PE teacher Frida (36), who couldn't pregnant in two years of fertility treatment remains obsessed by her child wish -jealous of family and friends- and dumps her, initially stating he needs time apart. Frida refuses to see reason when everyone advises her to accept reality, even her mother who has a new partner. She rather dates anyone, seeking only a father. Meanwhile Tobias starts a new life, refusing to keep sharing the rent, and her school career is grimly compromised when she blindly blames unidentified pupils for the Internet-posting of her elaborate notes on her and the school girls 'cycles', with obscene graphic humor, infuriating fellow staff and parents.
